title: Question on 'Smash'
body:
Hello all!

So just a question of Smash in Australia (sorry New Zealand)
So anyway, what events will be held at Smash? Because I know that LoL will be there, according to friends who are going.
Also the are some people that are going to cosplay there! Rooty Hill I believe where it's being held (NSW).

Not only will LoL will be there, also there will be Manga, Anime and something called 'Maid Cafe', I'm warned not to go into the Maid Cafe alone because it's very weird if you go in alone, seriously, you have a chick calling you 'Master' or whatever you like, which kinda puts out the 'Maid' part.

Anyway main question: "What events will Riot Games be holding for LoL @ Smash?"
Also if you're going to Smash, or have gone before, please tell me what it's like! Because I'm wanting to go, but seeing a Samoan there is quite weird, especially when your the ONLY Samoan there.

THANKS 4 YOUR COMMENTS (If there are any)

replies.body:
Hey Zen Bot,

Just to clarify League of Legends/Riot Games will not be at Smash. We are holding our own event at Luna Park for the OPL finals you can find more information [here](https://www.facebook.com/events/841338362606991/) and [here](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/)

aww i cri ;-;
Will Riot / LoL ever feature at Smash?

You should take out one of the smash days to come out to Luna Park! its going to be a great experience with heaps of activities. (Not to mention most of it is freeeeee.

As for if we will ever feature at Smash, there are no plans to currently but we are always reevaluating what we do and where we go.
Why did I think this post was about Super Smash Brothers =_=

>
> Why did I think this post was about Super Smash Brothers =_=

:( you and me both..
